# chagaspathway

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)
<!-- badges: end -->

Chapathways is an user-friendly Shiny app for public health professionals offering cost-efficient diagnostic testing recommendations for Chagas disease and allowing maximize resources for both patient and healthcare systems. Future updates will expand its capabilities to include additional diseases.

Latest working version of the app can be found at https://finddx.shinyapps.io/chagaspathway/ 

## Installation

You can install the current version of chagaspathway like so:

``` r
remotes::install_github("finddx/chagaspathway")
```

## Run the app locally in R

You can run the app locally by running:

```r
library(chagaspathway)
run_app()
```
